Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Slugger \Slug"ger\, n. One who strikes heavy blows; hence, a boxer; a prize fighter. [Cant or Slang] [1913 Webster] [1913 Webster]
slugger n 1: (baseball) a ballplayer who is batting [syn: {batter}, {hitter}, {batsman}] 2: a boxer noted for an ability to deliver hard punches [syn: {slogger}]
